attributes.action: Allow British citizens to carry non lethal protection
attributes.additional_details: British citizens have the right to protect themselves just like the police do.
attributes.background: Allow British citizens to carry non lethal protection in the form of a baton etc

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Make it legal to carry regulated non-lethal self-defence products" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743664
